TopicTitle: New textures are amazing! How are plans for Jool and Eeloo?

Articles.Content:
I took about a 1 year break from KSP and was delighted to come back to high res textures. I've visited Mun, Minmus, and Ike so far the views have really upped my excitement for the game. I really appreciate all the hard work the team has put into doing this. I'm much more driven to build exploration vehicles just to go around and admire the views, or do low-altitude orbits and just watch the landscape scroll underneath me.

Jool is my favorite system, but in this playthrough I've decided to hold off on visiting until they have high res texture too. I noticed there hasn't been a lot of activity in the announcements and daily kerbal section as of late. The pandemic has really screwed things up for a lot of people. How have they affected KSP 1 development? I hope the team is OK! Stay safe guys and gals, and know your work is appreciated and adored by this fan.

Major update due in July. They haven't said if there are new planet textures in it but frankly I'd be disappointed if there aren't. The April Fool's joke had a snazzy new texture for Jool, could be that's the new one except not orange ofc.
